Body:
arr = np.array([1.0, 2.0, 3.0, np.nan])
ordinal = CHAID.OrdinalColumn(arr)
nan_val = np.array([np.nan]).astype(int)[0]
assert [i for i in ordinal.all_combinations()] == [[[nan_val], [1, 2, 3]],
    [[nan_val, 1], [2, 3]], [[1], [nan_val, 2, 3]], [[nan_val], [1], [2, 3]
    ], [[nan_val, 1, 2], [3]], [[1, 2], [nan_val, 3]], [[nan_val], [1, 2],
    [3]], [[nan_val, 1], [2], [3]], [[1], [nan_val, 2], [3]], [[1], [2], [
    nan_val, 3]], [[nan_val], [1], [2], [3]]]
